goal.ch:
The purpose of the course "Stellar Formation and Evolution" is to understand the physics of formation and evolution of stars.

Course web page: https://s3b.astro.ncu.edu.tw/star_202202/

In case we need to have an on-line lecture, join us by clicking following link.
https://meet.google.com/bwn-knxk-qwq
goal.en:
The purpose of the course "Stellar Formation and Evolution" is to understand the physics of formation and evolution of stars.

Course web page: https://s3b.astro.ncu.edu.tw/star_202202/

In case we need to have an on-line lecture, join us by clicking following link.
https://meet.google.com/bwn-knxk-qwq

outline.ch:
- Basic assumptions for stellar evolution study
- Equations for stellar evolution study
- Basic physics of gas and radiation in stars
- Nuclear processes in stars
- Equilibrium stellar configurations
- Stability of stars
- Evolution of stars
- Stellar life cycle
outline.en:
- Basic assumptions for stellar evolution study
- Equations for stellar evolution study
- Basic physics of gas and radiation in stars
- Nuclear processes in stars
- Equilibrium stellar configurations
- Stability of stars
- Evolution of stars
- Stellar life cycle

textbook.ch:
"An Introduction to the Theory of Stellar Structure and Evolution"
Dina Prialnik
Cambridge University Press
2010
ISBN: 978-0-521-86604-0
textbook.en:
